about_the_game:
Inspired by games like FTL, XCOM, and Hades, Darklight Breach fuses the strategic depth of FTL with the tactical combat of XCOM, all wrapped in a fast-paced, arcade-style roguelite experience. 

INTO THE (DARKLIGHT) BREACH

Set in an alternate retro sci-fi universe, Darklight Breach explores a fractured humanity that has colonized space in splintered, self-segregating ways. Yet, one thread of humanity has managed to endure near the galactic core, clinging to survival through isolationism. You are part of this resilient thread.

Your story begins when you answer a distress call from a mysterious space station—one that shouldn’t even exist.

DIFFERENT WAYS TO SUCCEED

Darklight Breach is a challenging, high-stakes game that demands careful planning and quick thinking. Victory depends on how well you disable enemy ships and bases while minimizing damage to your own vessel and crew.

Will you:

  • Destroy enemy teleporters to prevent boarding parties?

  • Target critical weapon systems to neutralize their firepower?

  • Scout and assassinate the enemy captain for a swift resolution?

  • Lure foes into a deadly trap?

  • Blitz through the enemy ship with sheer force?

As captain, every decision you make shapes the fate of your crew and your mission. Choose wisely—your survival depends on it.

short_description: Darklight Breach is a sci-fi roguelite where you command a squad to infiltrate alien bases and ships. Design your ship carefully—every choice impacts your defense, stealth, and firepower. Can you navigate this dangerous region of space and survive?
